page.title: 10Religions in Our School
page.content: In our school there are 123 Christians, 50 Muslims, and 32 Sikhs. We have discovered that these religions have common beliefs. They all have one God, have similar moral codes and should strive for peace and friendship between people. Why,then,are there so many wars throughout the world between differing religious sects? All the churches have school.The Christian Sunday school teaches the life of Christ,whereas the Muslims and Sikhs teach arabic and punjabi respectively,the languages in which their holy books are written. The Christians believe that Jesus was the Son of God.Muslims believe that Mohammed was the Great Prophet of God. Sikhs believe that Nanak was the great teacher of God.
